short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension for downloading Moodle resources

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An open source chrome extension that enables students to download Moodle resources with a click of a button üíæ

Usage üñ±
1. Login in to your moodle (for example https://moodle.vle.monash.edu)
2. Open the Resources section for the course you wish to download the content for
3. Click on the extension icon and select the resources to be downloaded. Click and drag or use ‚åò key to select multiple options:
4. Hit the Download button to get the resources!

source code: https://github.com/harsilspatel/MoodleDownloader
